title: The Wild Bunch
writer: Walon Green, Sam Peckinpah, Roy N. Sickner
actors: William Holden, Ernest Borgnine, Robert Ryan
plot: An aging group of outlaws in 1913 Texas look for one last big score, selling stolen Army rifles to a rogue Mexican general during that country's revolution, as the traditional American West is disappearing around them.
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 6 wins & 8 nominations total
